title: Historia general y natural de las Indias, islas y tierra-firme del mar océano
imprint: Impr. de la Real Academia de la Historia
author: G. F. de Oviedo y Valdés
description: 3 pts. in 4 v. : plates, maps, plans ; 32 cm.
note: First vol published 1535 in Seville / intended as 3 vols / First full publication 1851–1855 in Madrid by RAH in 4 vols
